LiveAgentSessionHistory.name: LiveAgentSessionHistory
LiveAgentSessionHistory.description: This object is automatically created for each Chat session and stores information about changes made to the session.

DataType.description: Data type of the field that was changed.

Field.description: The name of the field that was changed in a session record.

LiveAgentSessionId.description: ID of the session record that was changed.

NewValue.description: The new value of the field that was changed.

OldValue.description: The original value of the field that was changed.
